column4: greetings channel, when I boot my ubuntu 9.10 box, it waits for about 5 mins with a console screen showing udev-work: rename(/dev//.udev-tmp,/dev//) failed. invalid cross-device link ... then after a long time it shows the ubuntu icon in white in the middle of the screen and then drops me to a busybox prompt ... could someone help me with recovering this box ?
I dont have windows on that box
Have you ran the Recovery option?
I think it Esc at boot, but let me check the docs.
